heading: HR00932
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE INVOLVEMENT OF LEOMARICK TRANS IN A ROAD ACCIDENT IN CARRANGLAN, NUEVA ECIJA ON APRIL 18, 2017, KILLING AT LEAST 32 PEOPLE, FOR THE PURPOSES OF PREVENTING FATAL ROAD ACCIDENTS AND PROVIDING STRICTER PENALTIES FOR SUCH INCIDENTS
